Class UI

java.lang.Object
UI
public class UI extends Object
Hold elements of the user interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UI()
    Constructor for UI elements; Adds text to display the score, number of lives remaining, and the number of fleets destroyed.
